labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: It shows no results. System Settings: Windows 10, Stable
data.expected_result: Either ignore that the search option has been used twice and show results or don't allow the same search option with the same value twice.
data.short_description: Using the same search option (from, mention, has, in (any except those with dates)) with the same value twice will not show any results.
data.steps_to_repro: - Use the search with one of the search options mentioned before (in the description). - Repeat step 1 with the exact same search option and value (eg. in: <#197043770141704193>, in: <#197043770141704193>).
